verification.payload:
tree cf31a3d20b20e6e7df02fdf72ca68dd9be44f2b9
parent 4b5c9191e3edf6d3c2ac52f95c91e30e357906c6
author Jon Atack <jon@atack.com> 1590660619 +0200
committer Jon Atack <jon@atack.com> 1592846794 +0200

doc: add release note for -getinfo displaying multiwallet balances

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@
+## CLI
+
+The `bitcoin-cli -getinfo` command now displays the wallet name and balance for
+each of the loaded wallets when more than one is loaded (e.g. in multiwallet
+mode) and a wallet is not specified with `-rpcwallet`. (#18594)
